data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 3,830 believers in Aube against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Aube, Grand Est, France
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Aube words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Aube, Grand Est, France honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Aube with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Romilly-sur-Seine
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Romilly-sur-Seine, Grand Est, France.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Aube, Grand Est, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Aube, Grand Est, France a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Aube, Grand Est, France. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: Aube
location.cities_list: Troyes, La Chapelle-Saint-Luc, Romilly-sur-Seine, Saint-André-les-Vergers, Sainte-Savine
location.cities_list_w_pop: Troyes (60,785), La Chapelle-Saint-Luc (14,623), Romilly-sur-Seine (14,566), Saint-André-les-Vergers (11,203), Sainte-Savine (11,172)
